column3: “🔥• veryy tasty 😋 and pretty T-26.75% indica bud that is as beautifully-stinky as it is vibrant & tasty (did upload a pic but can take few days to show up..) Citrus lime-hints in aroma + flavor, plus smooth, easy smoke on lungs is gonna make this a new fave.. thc content of almost-27% doesn't hurt euphoric effects of this mellowing 🌺.. am really enjoying this lovely headspace, as it's good for social activities & n...”
“This strain does what it says it does. It provides a great night's sleep. I woke up quite rested.”
“Don’t use during the day if you have things to do (will have you feeling groggy) amazing for getting a good nights sleep”
“Lives up to the name, a powerful indica with good pain relief and relaxing effects”
“Great OG .. Left me with extreme munchies”
“WHats the flowering time for this strain?”
